member.name: ID3D12ShaderReflectionConstantBuffer.GetDesc
member.param: A shader-buffer description, as a pointer to a structure.
member.returns: Returns one of the Direct3D 12 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D12ShaderReflectionConstantBuffer.GetVariableByIndex
member.summary: Gets a shader-reflection variable by index.
member.returns: A pointer to a shader-reflection variable interface (see ).

member.name: ID3D12ShaderReflectionConstantBuffer.GetVariableByName
member.summary: Gets a shader-reflection variable by name.
member.returns: Returns a sentinel object (end of list marker). To determine if GetVariableByName successfully completed, call and check the returned HRESULT; any return value other than success means that GetVariableByName failed.

member.name: ID3D12ShaderReflectionConstantBuffer
member.summary: This shader-reflection interface provides access to a constant buffer.
